dct_title_s: Carte des isles de Maiorque, Minorque et Yvice
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially and by hachures. Depths shown by soundings. Insets: : Plan du port et de la ville de Mahon et de ses forts -- [Map showing the Mediterranean coast from Gibraltar to Toulon].
